text: Chet "JR" White (1979/1980 – October 18, 2020) was an American record producer, rock musician and mix engineer. He was a member of the indie rock band Girls until their disbandment in 2012. He produced the album Goon by Tobias Jesso Jr. and Sob Story by the Spectrals. White was born in Santa Cruz, California. White died of a heart attack on October 18, 2020 in Santa Cruz, aged 40. ==Works== *Album – Girls (2009, True Panther Sounds) *Broken Dreams Club – Girls (2010, True Panther Sounds) *Father, Son, Holy Ghost – Girls (2011, True Panther Sounds) ==References== Category:1979 births Category:1980 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Engineers from California Category:American rock musicians Category:American record producers Category:Musicians from California Category:Businesspeople from California
title: Chet "JR" White
